caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 4.
Arthrosolaenomeris chapadensis Schubart, 1943
(holotype, MZSP 1092), dorsal views of anterior (A), midbody (B) and posterior (C) body rings. Scale bars: 2 mm. Left gonopod. (D), mesal view; (E), ventral view; (F), ectal view. Scale bars: 1 mm. Abbreviations: C, cingulum; PfP, prefemoral process; S, solenomere; SPr, secondary process of the prefemoral process.

FIGURE 5.
Arthrosolaenomeris pantanalensis Schubart, 1943
(holotype, MZSP 1085), dorsal views of anterior (A), midbody (B) and posterior (C) body rings. Scale bars: 2 mm. Left gonopod. (D), mesal view; (E), ventral view; (F), ectal view. Scale bars: 1 mm. Abbreviations: C, cingulum; PfP, prefemoral process; S, solenomere; SPr, secondary process of the prefemoral process.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution. State of Mato Grosso , Brazil ( Fig. 11 ).
